entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
